devices

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • devices.Device
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AlertHandler, Context, Usable, EventObject, Observable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoffeeMaker, Fridge, Lamp, Loudspeaker, Microwave, Oven, Shower, Stove, Toilet, Turntable, TV

    public abstract class Device
extends java.lang.Object
implements Usable, Observable, Context, AlertHandler, EventObject
    Creates and manages devices.
